text:
The Client doesn't support the fully functionality of LOCK / UNLOCK methods. 
Missing functions are:
- setting timeout for locks
- setting different owner of lock (important for testing)
- setting of lock type (shared or exclusive)
creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de

text:

Patch of fully support.
